import React, { useState } from 'react' import {Col, Container, Row, Button, Nav} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const Detail = (props) => { const {shoes} = props let{id} = useParams(); const [tab, setTab] = useState(0) return (

{shoes[id].title}

{shoes[id].content}

{shoes[id].price}상품가격
{ setTab(0) }}>버튼0 버튼1 버튼2
내용0
내용1
내용2
 ) } export default Detail
